description:
A member of Heavens. He looks up to Ren like a brother and aspires to be like him. He’s short but it is very competitive. Although Wong is still a child, he is loyal and never forgets the favor that has been done for him. He’s the most dexterous member of Heavens and is good at picking locks. Wong is a young boy with a pure heart and kindness.
Source: Official site
name: Wong
